tgroups.name: Stanford T-Group
tgroups.description: An intensive week-long experiential learning program focused on interpersonal dynamics, emotional intelligence, and leadership development. Participants engage in unstructured group sessions to explore communication patterns, group dynamics, and self-awareness.

tgroups.name: Leaders in Tech T-Group
tgroups.description: A T-group program specifically designed for tech leaders and entrepreneurs. Focuses on authentic leadership, vulnerability, and building genuine connections in high-stakes environments. Small cohorts of 8-12 participants.

tgroups.name: Juncture T-Group Program
tgroups.description: Ongoing T-group experiences for professionals seeking deeper self-awareness and interpersonal effectiveness. Combines classic T-group methodology with contemporary practices. Small groups meet regularly over several months.

tgroups.name: NTL Institute T-Group
tgroups.description: The original T-group experience from the founders of the methodology. Offers various programs from weekend workshops to week-long intensives. Focus on applied behavioral science and organizational development.
